sourcesContent: import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { title = 'Assignment2'; ratings = [ { name: 'Todd Aaron', content: 'Todd Aaron: content text', rate: 4, }, { name: 'Jesse Bing', content: 'Jesse Bing: content text', rate: 1, }, { name: 'Tori Mitchell', content: 'Tori Mitchell: content text', rate: 2, }, { name: 'John Nelson', content: 'John Nelson: content text', rate: 4, }, ]; }
